title: Blueberry Cheesecake
instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (165°C).
2. Mix graham crumbs, melted butter, and 2 tablespoons sugar until well combined. Pat mixture into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan.
3. Mash cream cheese until soft and creamy. Gradually beat in sour cream, 3/4 cup sugar, flour, and vanilla. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Pour mixture into the crumb-lined pan.
4. Bake until firm to the touch, about 1 hour.
5. Place baked cheesecake in the refrigerator until thoroughly chilled, about 4 hours.
6. Remove cheesecake from the pan by loosening edges with a knife and opening the springform latch. Transfer to a serving platter. Place frozen blueberries on top. Melt jelly in a saucepan over low heat; spoon over blueberries to glaze. Chill until ready to serve.
